help-file.title: FORGE FORGING
help-file.content:
Forging is one of the primary skills of the Alchemist Class. By collecting material pieces from the corpses of dead mobs an alchemist can forge a wide range of weapons that can be used or sold at shops.
Forging is much like Crafting in that the more items you have the bigger weapons you can make, and works in much the same way, except that you do not specify the "material".
Select only the materials you want to use, place them into your inventory and type:
forge weapon-type
For example, if you have two of "a cracked magical steel piece" in your inventory and type "forge dagger" you may end up with a dagger called "a crude steel dagger".
Identifying the item after it is created will show you the stats. The quality of the material used, your skill in forging and your current level all play a part in how powerful your newly forged weapons become. We are not giving out material formulas as it is a closely guarded alchemist secret and nobody wants a guild of alchemists on their back.
